about_the_game:
Dive into the enigmatic world of "DEEPER CREEPER LUST," a visually stunning visual novel that unravels an extraordinary tale of mystery and oceanic wonders. Immerse yourself in the captivating story of Ava, a young woman whose serene beach day takes a fantastical turn when an immense sea creature emerges from the depths.

Key Features:


  • Mystical Encounters: Explore a rich narrative filled with unexpected twists and turns as Ava encounters a colossal sea creature with tentacles that seem to bridge the gap between the mundane and the mystical.
  • Breathtaking Visuals: Let the mesmerizing artwork transport you to a world where the sun-kissed beach meets the ethereal beauty of an otherworldly sea creature. The intricate details and vibrant colors bring "DEEPER CREEPER LUST" to life.
  • Choose Your Path: Shape Ava's destiny through interactive decision-making moments that impact the unfolding narrative. Navigate the depths of emotions and relationships as you guide Emily through this extraordinary adventure.
  • Oceanic Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in an evocative soundtrack that mirrors the ebb and flow of the ocean. Each note enhances the atmosphere, intensifying the emotional resonance of every moment.
  • Unveil the Secrets: Unravel the mysteries of the deep as you accompany Emily on her journey. Discover hidden truths, forge unexpected alliances, and confront the unknown in a tale that blurs the lines between reality and fantasy.
Embark on a captivating odyssey in "DEEPER CREEPER LUST" – where the sea holds secrets, and every choice you make shapes the course of an unforgettable adventure. Are you ready to plunge into the depths of mystery and magic?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 20 years old.
This game contains the following sexual content: sexual acts, extreme violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, tentacle erotica (触手責め, shokushu zeme).
This game doesn't contains the following content : drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, suicide.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: DEEPER CREEPER LUST🐙😱

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
